column4: I used the command sudo apt-get install java-gcj-compat-headless but I still can't get the java to work
use "add/remove" search for "java", if it's not working what are you trying to do and what is happening when it fails?
use "add/remove" search for "java", install java support, then try to view on firefox whatever it is youre trying to view, if it fails describe the issue you are experiencing
j"java support" is included in java 6.0 plugin or ubuntu restricted extras, java runtime will also install what you need
